description:
Corn`s Hiyappu was first revealed in the Sanyo Gym when Ash was shown the three gym leaders Pokémon and he looked it up in his PokéDex. Hiyappu is Pod`s main Pokémon and is relied on for gym battles.
Hiyappu battled against Ash`s Pikachu during Ash`s gym battle. Hiyappu showed its was a strong opponent and was able to avoid Pikachu`s attacks as Corn`s strategy proved to be enough to defeat Pikachu.
name: Hiyappu (Corn)
